title: Result Obtained : Pass with Distinction
description: Presented with the Land and Property Service course award for ‘Outstanding contribution to GIS’ for the development of a .NET based application, written in Visual Basic, to help identify suitable marine conservation areas within Northern Ireland.

details.description: Spatial Data Management - Visual Basic with MapObjects    (89)
Spatial Data Management (ESRI ArcGIS and SPSS)            (79)

title: Result Obtained : Pass
description: In this conversion Masters course I had my first exposure to Computer Science, and to Java. I obtained insight into many of the algorithms and data structures which I use today, and it served as a solid foundation to the experience I have obtained since.

title: Result Obtained : 2:1
description: Initially when I left secondary education I was interested in Geography. As things progressed I realized I had a greater interest in Computers, which I explored upon completed of my B.Sc.
